head(bed_ewas)

dupes = diff_data[which(diff_data==1),]

print(dupes)

print(bed_ewas[rownames(bed_ewas)==rownames(dupes[1,]),])

print(which(rownames(bed_ewas)==rownames(dupes[1,])))
